title: The Lone Ranger and the Lost City of Gold

sources.title: The Lone Ranger And The Lost City Of Gold
sources.description: Three Indians are murdered. Each was wearing a medallion when he died. Together the medallions form a puzzle whose solution points to gold.

metadata.Plot: Three Indians are murdered. Each was wearing a medallion when he died. Together the medallions form a puzzle whose solution points to gold.
metadata.Writer: Robert Schaefer, Eric Freiwald, George W. Trendle
metadata.Actors: Clayton Moore, Jay Silverheels, Douglas Kennedy
